headline: PPG’s Patrick O’Neill recognized with Lifetime Achievement Award from Paints and Coatings Industry Magazine
summary: PITTSBURGH, September 08, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced Patrick O’Neill, PPG global synthesis and pilot director, was recognized with a Lifetime Achievement Award from Paints and Coatings Industry (PCI) Magazine. This award recognizes individuals for their outstanding contributions to the coatings industry and is presented at the Coatings Trends & Technologies Summit.

content.title: PPG’s Patrick O’Neill recognized with Lifetime Achievement Award from Paints and Coatings Industry Magazine
content.summary: PITTSBURGH, September 08, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced Patrick O’Neill, PPG global synthesis and pilot director, was recognized with a Lifetime Achievement Award from Paints and Coatings Industry (PCI) Magazine. This award recognizes individuals for their outstanding contributions to the coatings industry and is presented at the Coatings Trends & Technologies Summit.

headline: Automotive Refinish Coatings Industry Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Axalta, PPG Industries, and BASF Lead with Sustainability, Innovation, and Global Expansion
summary: The "Automotive Refinish Coatings Companies Quadrant" delivers strategic insights into the global automotive refinish coatings market. This analysis evaluates over 100 companies, identifying the Top 10 industry leaders, including Axalta Coating Systems, PPG Industries, and BASF SE, based on criteria such as revenue, technology, and market presence. Automotive refinish coatings are essential for vehicle restoration and protection and include specialized components like primers and clearcoats. Adv
